CodeplexIssue.Title: Error when opening Word samples in Word 2007
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
When I run the word C# samples I get an error dialog when opening the resulting doc afterwords. The dialog says: Title: C# WordRibbonAddin Text: An error occured in OnAction. 
    Error accessing resource Stream

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: thanks for request. can you tell me the .net framework version ?

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: now i see the mistake. *damn it the method to read the embedded xml file in COM Addin Ribbon Example was wrong. the problem is not associated to the normal examples. needs one day to fix it. issue is in progress now.
